caption.title: Weekly 40-week forecasts for H1N1, generated using the SIR-PF forecast system.
caption.p: Each frame shows a two-year time window (month and year shown on the x-axis); ILI+ observations are shown by the ‘x’; the grey vertical line indicates the time of forecast initiation (specified by the week ending shown at the top left corner); fitted ILI+ prior to the forecast are shown by the solid blue line; predicted ILI+ for the following 40 weeks are shown by the dashed blue line.
Click here for additional data file.
